Belgium: Philip the Bold founds the Lille Chamber of Accounts to audit the accounts of his functionaries in the county of Flanders.
Serbia: The Serbian army led by Prince Lazar defeats the Ottomans in the Battle of Plocnik.
Switzerland: Battle of Sempach. Lucerne, Uri, Schwyz, Unterwalden and Zürich decisively defeat a Habsburg army. The victory begins to change the Confederation from a loose pact into a unified entity and allows expansion into former Habsburg lands.
